title: IDowelSymbol.IGetArcPoints
description: Gets the start, mid, and end points (in 2D only) of the arc segment on which this dowel symbol is based.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of size 6 containing start, mid, and end point x and y coordinates VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks: If the arc segment is a complete circle, the start and end points are the same, and the midpoint is at the 180 position.
